Hero.Title: Servicing
Text: Cleveland Prestige is able to carry out logbook servicing on all vehicles.
Through regular servicing, our skilled mechanics can help ensure that your car runs smoothly.
Furthermore, any parts at risk of damage and can be fixed before the issue escalates.
Consistent logbook servicing is also attractive to potential buyers when itâ€™s time to sell your vehicle.

Features.Title: Cleveland Prestige specialises in various servicing products:

Questions.Question: WHAT'S THE DIFFERENCE BETWEEN A 'CUT AND POLISH' AND A PAINT CORRECTION?
Questions.Answer: A "cut and polish" is a process that removes surface imperfections and enhances shine, while a paint correction involves more extensive measures to remove deeper scratches, swirl marks, and other defects from the paintwork.

Questions.Question: WHY IS IT IMPORTANT TO DETAIL YOUR CAR?
Questions.Answer: It is important to detail your car to maintain its appearance, protect the paintwork, preserve its value, and create a more enjoyable driving experience.

Questions.Question: HOW LONG DOES A PAINT CORRECTION TAKE?
Questions.Answer: The duration of a paint correction can vary depending on the extent of the damage and the size of the vehicle, but it typically takes several hours to a few days to complete.

Questions.Question: HOW MUCH DOES A PAINT JOB COST?
Questions.Answer: The cost of a paint job can vary depending on factors such as the size of the vehicle, desired finish, and any additional repairs needed, but we make sure to provide you with the best prices.
